import { Route } from "react-router" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import Address from "./Address.js" import CartSummary from "./CartSummary.js" import Order from "./Order.js" import Payment from "./Payment.js" import {useRouteMatch} from 'react-router-dom' function Checkout(){ var route= useRouteMatch() var url=route.url var path=route.path console.log("..",route) console.log("url",url) return(
  • Cart Summary

) } export default Checkout
